It has been stipulated that expenditure on ceremony should be kept to a minimum level and should not exceed Rs. 3 lakhs. In case Of important functions the expenditure ceiling will be decided by the Ministry on case to case basis. 2. It has been decided with the approval of the Competent Authority that proposals   involving expenditure not  exceeding Rs.3 Iakhs may be approved at Member level: Proposals   involving   expenditure exceeding Rs.3 lakhs shall be put up to the Chairman for onward transmission to GGovernment. 4 This issues with the approval of Chairman: (V.K.Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord /LA) To AllLolticers_andemployees of_HQLZORROs[PIUsLCMUslSite_Qffices 4 ?
